titles.title: A bill for the relief of Marsha D. Christopher.

bill.summary: 3/30/1987--Introduced. Relieves a named individual of the liability to refund to the United States any benefit paid in compensation for injuries received while performing duties as a letter carrier. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to such individual any amount of compensation refunded and any amount of reduction in compensation payable in connection with such injuries.
